attendance.description:
Member's presence over the last 6 months.
Attendance is automatically recorded when the member connects to the coworking's wifi network.
attendance.title: Attendance

header.description: Present for the last time on {date}

orders.description:
All orders placed by this member, along with their amounts.
Orders for coffee and other goodies like donations are excluded.

tickets.remaining: None available | More than one | {count} remaining
tickets.title: Individual Tickets

orders.title: Order History

profile.description:
Contact information and other personal data of this member.
This information is not public.

manager.description:
Allows managing members and services and accessing all features.
In short, it has full powers.
manager.label: Administrator

parking.description: Allows opening the parking barrier through the mobile application.
parking.label: Parking Access

macAddresses.add: Specify a device | Add another device | Add other devices

profile.title: Profile
